ssbrc.name: Super Smash Bros. Re:Crafted!
ssbrc.profile.warn.force_reset: Since you were last online, an admin has reset all player data. Your data has been reset.
ssbrc.profile.reset.prompt: Are you sure you want to clear your save data?
ssbrc.profile.reset.explain_resets:
This will reset the following:
- Fighters & Skins
- Credits
- Stats
- Leaderboard Standing
ssbrc.profile.reset.explain_preservation:
However, it will keep preferences such as:
- Favorites
- Client-Side Settings
ssbrc.profile.reset.confirm: Your data has been successfully reset.
ssbrc.game.start.warn.same_teams: All players cannot be on the same team!
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.nessis: I'm Ness, project lead and founder of Super Smash Bros. Re:Crafted. I can't thank you enough for checking out our game. Please remember to subscribe for further updates, and join our discord to provide feedback!
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.inquog: Hi, Patrick here! I'm a video game developer who is currently focusing on Minecraft projects while I expand my skillset. You can find all of my work on our PlanetMinecraft page!
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.orionb: Hi, I’m Alex. I am not real.
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.jedima: Hello! I am Homer, an SSBRC Tester, Builder/Designer, Fighter Consultant, Artist of most Miiverse posts, and very happy to work with so many people that are more talented than I. Check out my YouTube channel where I do reveals for SSBRC and other content here:
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.lostpu: Pufferfish are part of a healthy diet.
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.sugars: I’ve worked on this project for a long while now, please enjoy <3
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.homega: I am a 3D modeler and animator using BlockBench, a pixel artist, and I have a youtube channel with many tutorials and documentation of my work:
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.pxlsam: Heya! I'm Pxlsamosa! I've been making pixel art for about 2+ years now ^_^. Celeste and Minecraft have inspired me a lot to step foot in the world of pixel art. Please take a look at my website for my content:
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.peteer: I am a skin maker and this is my portfolio:
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.davidt: You've met with a terrible fate, haven't you?
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.ricard: Howdy, I’m Joe!! I like Mario and I do digital art and pixel art on occassion! I worked on textures for Alucard, Hero, Link, and Snake! Check out my art here:
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.pastap: Hey Paisanos, always remember to leave your shoes outside at night. That way the Sole Goblins have something to eat.
ssbrc.lobby.credits.developer_bio.miffen: Hi there, I'm Jax and I was the one who optimized the Resource Pack! (Oh ya and I make 3D models and renders)
ssbrc.lobby.tips.1: As the Mario Bros., you can hold down your sneak key for a special super jump!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.2: Harness the power of Link's great courage! Hold down Your sneak key and Master Sword to charge up a spin attack!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.3: Rack up K.O.s with Zelda's obsidian based weapons in order to increase their power!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.4: Munching the Pac-Dots on Pac-Maze can make special bonus fruits and Pac-Pellets appear!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.5: Have you heard the rumors? Some have claimed to see specially colored Pokèmon out there!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.6: Zelda's glass weapons are brittle, make sure you have enough rupees in reserve to refresh your inventory.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.7: You can control the direction of Ness's PK Flash with your mouse cursor.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.8: Accumulating K.O.s with Snake's CQC Knife can yield ammo drops.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.9: You can accumulate more credits with a win-streak.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.10: Try to accumulate 10 wins with each character. You just might get a special reward if you do!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.11: Sonic & Shadow both can build up acceleration by running around without jumping, taking, or dealing damage.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.12: Accumulating 20 Mana with Hero will grant you the ultimate spell - Magic Burst!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.13: The form of Altered Beast depends on the terrain of the stage.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.14: Trying out a new character? Remember to check the tool tips on each of your items!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.15: You can predict the order in which Pokèmon Trainer swaps out their Pokèmon - it goes in Pokèdex order!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.16: You can predict the order in which Team Rocket swaps out their Pokèmon - it goes in reverse Pokèdex order!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.17: The options menu for the current game can be awarded to any player besides the winner of the previous game.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.18: Using an Angel's Feather on Palutena's Temple will give you a super jump.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.19: The FG II-Graham on Pyrosphere can be destroyed if they sustain enough damage.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.20: Zelda can obtain rupees from non-player opponents as well, such as Stalfos or FG II-Graham.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.21: Yar gains a random power up with every K.O.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.22: Pikachu's electric terrain produces an electric field that effects several aspects of the game, not just Pikachu!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.23: Wave Beam has the ability to pierce thin walls.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.24: Be careful about usage of Sora's drive forms! Get too greedy, and you may find yourself corroded by darkness.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.25: Snake's vision won't be obscured by his own smoke grenades.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.26: Pit's Power of Flight will be lost after use - don't worry! It will be restored after a few seconds.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.27: Byleth can regain their legendary relics by accumulating K.Os.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.28: When on his last legs, Ryu can give in to the power of the Satsui no Hado. Be careful, such power comes with a great price...
ssbrc.lobby.tips.29: Want to stay up to date on news, updates, and community events? Join our Discord and subscribe to us on YouTube!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.30: Sora's Wisdom Form provides faster MP recovery and new tiers of spells.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.31: Sora's Valor Form provides higher attack damage and jump height, as well as a secondary keyblade to perform a special Strike Raid ability.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.32: Greninja can breathe underwater longer than other fighters!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.33: Snake becomes stealthier and faster the fewer items he brings into battle!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.34: Alucard's Blood Metamorphosis will power up his next ability, at the cost of a few hearts.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.35: Shadow's alignment changes depending on who he faces in battle. An opponent with a Hero or Villain alignment can affect his ultimate ability.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.36: Yar can summon a drone with his remote, which will lock on and shoot at nearby enemies. Enemies can destroy it, so try to recall it often so it can heal!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.37: Watch out for tornadoes on the upper castle walls of Hyrule Castle! They pack quite a punch!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.38: Lake of Rage can be played on during one of three parts of day - morning, day, or night. You may see different Pokèmon depending on the time of day.
ssbrc.lobby.tips.39: Enjoying the game? Be sure to like and follow us and our projects on Planet Minecraft!
ssbrc.lobby.tips.40: To preserve your speed with Sonic or Shadow, be sure to press the sprint button again right after attacking!
ssbrc.sandbag.intro.1: Hey you! Come over here for a second, will you?
ssbrc.sandbag.intro.2: That's the spirit! Welcome to Super Smash Bros. Re:Crafted! You're new around here, huh? That's alright, I'm here to get you up to speed and ready to fight! My name is Mr. Sandbag. Here, take this Selector. Now point it at me and use it to talk to me!
ssbrc.sandbag.reminder: Hey! You lost? To get started, walk over to the pad to my left!
ssbrc.sandbag.intro.3: Great job! You're getting the hang of this. You'll need that item to select fighters and interact with other objects! When you're ready, walk over to the pad to my left to start a match! I'll help you further in there.
ssbrc.sandbag.fighter_select.1: You made it, good! In this room, you can select a fighter to enter the battle with. Each fighter has a different set of attributes and abilities. To select a fighter, aim your Selector at them and use it!
ssbrc.sandbag.fighter_select.unowned: This fighter is currently locked! Fighters highlighted in red will not be able to be selected until you purchase them in the shop.
ssbrc.sandbag.fighter_select.2: Great job! You have now selected a fighter. In your hotbar, you will notice you now have two new items: Skin Options and Wiki. Though you don't have any skins yet, Skin Options will eventually list out all of the skins you have unlocked for that fighter. Wiki will take you to the wiki page for that fighter, which will give much more detailed info on their moveset.
ssbrc.sandbag.stage_select.1: Welcome to the stage select area! In here, you can vote for the stage to battle on. On the wall are 8 recommended stages based on the size of your lobby, but if you're looking for a specific stage or don't like the selections, the Stage Index behind you can be used to vote for any stage!
ssbrc.sandbag.outro.1: Hey! How was your first ever match? Hope it went well! When you get the chance, can you come see me, please?
ssbrc.sandbag.outro.2: I just wanted to say congratulations! That pretty much covers the basics. I think you're ready to go out there and become a champion! As a token to your success, please take these Credits. They should give you a small head-start! Credits can be spent in the Shop for new Fighters and other cosmetics! From here on out, you can speak to me again for helpful tips! Good luck out there!
ssbrc.sandbag.stand_on.2: Do you think you could get off of me, please?
ssbrc.sandbag.stand_on.3: This is really starting to get old...
ssbrc.sandbag.stand_on.4: I bet you don't go around standing on everyone you meet!
ssbrc.sandbag.stand_on.5: I tried to be nice! Please don't do that again.
ssbrc.fighter_select.spectate_game: You are now spectating the game! To rejoin the game, please select a fighter.
ssbrc.fighter_select.unowned: You do not own this fighter!
ssbrc.game.end.warn.singleplayer: One-player matches do not count towards your stats.
ssbrc.game.end.warn.cheater: You did not gain anything for this match because you switched gamemodes.
ssbrc.game.end.warn.spectator: You did not gain anything for this match because you were a spectator.
ssbrc.options.game_mode.description: Controls how the game will function.
ssbrc.options.game_mode.stock.descriptio: In this mode, you get a limited number of lives. When you lose your last life, you are out of the game.
ssbrc.options.game_mode.time.description: In this mode, you are never out of the game. Instead, you have a certain amount of time to get as many points as you can.
ssbrc.options.game_mode.ctf.description: In this mode, two teams compete to capture the other teams' flag as much as possible.
ssbrc.options.stock_limit.description: Controls how many stocks players have.
ssbrc.options.time_limit.description: Controls how long the game will last.
ssbrc.options.teams.description: When enabled, players will be able to join teams that fight and win as one unit.
ssbrc.options.blind_pick.description: When enabled, players will not be able to see the fighter recieved when selecting random.
ssbrc.options.friendly_fire.description: When enabled, players will be able to hurt teammates and NPCs under their control.
ssbrc.options.hazards.description: When enabled, stages may contain new mechanics such as traps, enemies, and other elements not part of the base terrain.
ssbrc.options.music.description: Controls how the custom music is handled.
ssbrc.options.music.loop.description: The song selected at the beginning of the match is looped until the match ends.
ssbrc.options.music.shuffle.description: Picks a new song at random repeatedly until the match ends.
ssbrc.options.reset.confirm: Game options have been reset to default!
ssbrc.admin.force_reset: All player data has been successfully reset.
ssbrc.fighters.menu.select_random: You have selected a Random fighter!
ssbrc.fighters.mastery: You have achieved mastery as this fighter and unlocked their Gold skin!
ssbrc.fighters.effects.knock_off: One of your items were knocked away!

ssbrc.fighters.byleth.house.blue_lions.d: A house comprised of those hailing from the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus. As a representative of the Blue Lions house, you fight with spear abilities. Some may refer to this class as a 'Holy Knight'.
A house comprised of those hailing from the Leicester Alliance. As a representative of the Golden Deer house, you fight with exclusive bow skills and great speed. Some may refer to this class as a 'Sniper'.
ssbrc.fighters.byleth.house.black_eagles: A house comprised of those hailing from the Adrestian Empire. As a representative of the Black Eagles house, you fight with heavy strikes and hefty defense. Some may refer to this class as a 'Fortress Knight'.
ssbrc.tooltips.byleth.blue_lions.areadbh: ] to charge up a spin attack
ssbrc.tooltips.byleth.blue_lions.steed_c: ] to summon a steed for 5 seconds
ssbrc.tooltips.byleth.blue_lions.swiftne: - Gain increased movement speed at low health
ssbrc.tooltips.byleth.golden_deer.failna: - Takes much longer to charge than a standard bow
- Gains higher damage, piercing and velocity at full charge
ssbrc.tooltips.byleth.golden_deer.brave_: - Fires two arrows when fully charged
ssbrc.tooltips.byleth.golden_deer.resist: - Gain increased defense at low health
] while powered to unleash a powerful shockwave
] on the ground to unleash a powerful shockwave
ssbrc.tooltips.byleth.black_eagles.heavy: - Nearby fighters increase armor at low health
ssbrc.tooltips.pit.wings.description.1: - Flight is lost after a few seconds of use
ssbrc.tooltips.pit.wings.description.2: - Flight restored several seconds after getting lost
ssbrc.fighters.snake.loadout.undo.descri: Click here to undo this choice.
ssbrc.fighters.snake.loadout.done.descri: Click here when you are done selecting your loadout.
ssbrc.fighters.snake.loadout.warn.encumb: You're encumbered! You can't equip this.
ssbrc.fighters.snake.anti_personnel_mine: A deployable mine that takes time to arm. Explodes when an opponent or projectile comes into contact, dealing high damage.
ssbrc.tooltips.snake.anti_personnel_mine: - Takes a few seconds to arm
ssbrc.fighters.snake.famas.description: A weapon with a high rate of fire, at the cost of damage and ammo usage.
ssbrc.fighters.snake.psg1.description: A slow, high-damage weapon whose bullets travel long distances with high accuracy.
ssbrc.fighters.snake.s1000.description: Ideal for a run-and-gun playstyle. Has a spread and medium damage potential, medium rate of fire and low range.
ssbrc.fighters.snake.smoke_grenade.descr: A grenade that deploys smoke cover wherever it is thrown for 15 seconds, obscuring Snake and obstructing vision of opponents.
ssbrc.fighters.snake.socom.description: A handgun with reliable rate of fire and damage, with medium range. Comes with two extra clips.
ssbrc.tooltips.snake.cqc_knife.descripti: - Scavenges ammo upon killing an opponent
ssbrc.tooltips.snake.stealth.description: - Can also be disabled after not engaging with opponents for too long
ssbrc.tooltips.snake.status.undetected.d: - You may become detected after staying idle too long...
